job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: GoCanvas is on the lookout for an extremely talented Engineer who has a passion for web software and the mobile revolution Your mission is to maintain develop and improve the GoCanvas Platform making our vision for the GoCanvas product become a reality Youll be central to the team unleashing the power of distributed technology for our tens of thousands of customers worldwidebrbrYou will work within a small yet capable Agile team environment Your work will be incredibly impactful to our customers helping them to run their business with powerful workforce management features like mobile dispatch and workflow management  all with a delightful user experience that makes complex technology approachablebrbrYoull receive training to become familiar with our culture systems mobile app platform and strategy Youll gain tremendous experience in scaling a rapidly growing SaaS company Were looking for Aplayers who believe in our mission share our values and arent afraid to join us on this gamechanging ridebrbrstrongYour Most Important ProjectsbrstrongulliWork with your engineering team to build highquality welltested software in our core Ruby on Rails web applicationliliDeliver functionality that helps GoCanvas customers manage their mobile workforce define and automate workflows and sync with a global fleet of mobile devices running GoCanvasliliConsider the security of all facets of our softwareliliWork with outstanding product development design and user experience teams to build a web business platform thats easy to pick up and delightful to usebrbrliulstrongWhat Success Looks LikebrstrongulliBuild quality software that positively impacts GoCanvas customersliliNever stop learning and never stop applying what you learn back into GoCanvasliliBuild effective working relationships and display effective communication with teamsbrbrliulstrongWhat You BringbrstrongulliProficiency with HTML CSS JavaScript and knowledge of web standardsliliExperience with a modern frontend JavaScript framework React Angular VuejsliliExperience with one or more common web application frameworks eg Ruby on Rails preferred Django Spring Express etcliliExperience working with Bootstrap Material Tailwind or internal design systemsliliFamiliarity with defensive programming techniques cybersecurity and developer tools that highlight potential risksliliStrong fundamental knowledge of software engineering design patterns and handson experience with development best practicesliliA passion for amazing products and great engineering teamsliliStrong selforganization and selfmanagement skillsliliExcellent written and oral communication skillsliliThe desire to be a part of a team thats just as passionate as youbrbrliulstrongSo Whats GoCanvasbrbrstrongGoCanvas is a mobile platform that makes it simple for businesses to automate how work is done replacing outdated processes and expensive paperwork The GoCanvas App works on smartphones and tablets helping companies easily collect information across their organization share it instantly and gain realtime insight on their business operations GoCanvas can be easily customized by all types of businesses to empower their workforce unleashing the value in data across the organization to help better connect with colleagues and engage more effectively with customers Automating millions of workplace activities for wellknown brands like Pepsi Honda and Red Bull means theres a good chance you have been around someone using GoCanvas in the past 24 hours making us one of the fastestgrowing mobile platforms in the worldbrbrOur recent achievements as an organization include The 2020 Golden Bridge Award for Company Rethinking of the Year and being named by Deloitte as one of thebrbrstrongWhat GoCanvas BringsbrbrstrongWe believe hiring the right people is THE most important thing we do We take our values seriously and look for these traits in everyone we hire Empathy Innovation Authenticity Impactful Team Player and CheekyFun Loving We believe in giving people the freedom to work but staying inspired by their important metrics to think and act like owners of our business We provide an environment that allows for innovation and creativity and a chance for individuals passionate about their role to have fun at work You can learn more about recent activities on ourbrbrWhile we believe culture trumps perks we are also proud to provide a comprehensive benefits package designed to meet our team members needs and truly invest in you withbrulliUnlimited Vacation Policy also known as unlimited PTOlili13 CompanyPaid Holidays which include GoCanvass Birthday Earth Day and Juneteenth to name a fewliliMedical Insurance where the Employee Only level of coverage is freeliliDental and Vision Insurance with employer contribution liliHealth Savings or Flexible Spending Account depending upon your medical plan selectionliliBasic Term Life Insurance and Personal Accident InsuranceliliVoluntary Life InsuranceliliShort and LongTerm Disabilitylili401k plan with employer matchliliPet InsuranceliliParental LeavebrbrliulWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company We do not discriminate on the basis of race religion color national origin gender sexual orientation age marital status veteran status or disability status We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills The more inclusive we are the better our work will bebrbrIf you need special assistance or accommodation while seeking employment with us please email recruitinggocanvascom or call 703 5478588brbrWe are interested in every qualified candidate who is eligible to work in the United States However we are not able to sponsor visasbrbrNo 3rd party recruiting firms submitting candidates from job sites strongThis role is a opportunitybrbrstrongPowered by JazzHRbrbrFFfyfmdV6Vbrbr
